metadata.title: Proceedings of the Alberta Soil Science Workshop

Soil Science Workshop (Alberta)
Western Canada Nitrogen Symposium (1976 : Calgary, Alta.)
Western Canada Phosphate Symposium (1980 : Calgary, Alta.)
metadata.description:
Digitization of this title is in recognition of the service of Mr. Paul Li, member of the University of Alberta Libraries 2014-2016 Students' Library Advisory Council.
Vols. for 1971-1981 have also a distinctive title: 1971-Nitrogen : soils, crops and the environment; 1972-Land use; 1973-Crop production potential in Alberta; 1974-Scientific input for soil management modelling; 1976-Proceedings of Western Canada nitrogen symposium "hosted by" Alberta Soil Science Workshop; 1977-Soil conservation reclamation & research; 1978-;1979-Effective use of nutrient resources in crop production; Proceedings of the Western Canada phosphate symposium "hosted by" Alberta Soil Science Workshop; 1981-Agricultural land : our disappearing heritage-a symposium; 2001-Phosphorus in our environment; 2004-Soil salinity
Workshop name changed in 1968 from Soil Science Workshop (Alberta) to Alberta Soil Science Workshop
Department name changed in 1992 to Alberta Agriculture, Food and Rural Development
AGL Great West Life*2006 only available on the Web at http://www.soilsworkshop.ab.ca/schedule2006.cfm
metadata.notes: No title page found. No copyright page found.
